name: Controlicz
0:
”Alexa, turn off the Kitchen Light”
”Alexa, set the kitchen lights to 50%”
”Alexa, set the kitchen temperature to 20 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use this to discover and interact with your devices being managed by the Home Automation software, 
Domoticz. 
To use the skill, register at www.controlicz.com, enter your Domoticz details,
then use your Controlicz email/password to link the skill.
You can control lights/switches/blinds/thermostats/sensors and more to come!
